list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Implement ProductService with external UserService integration
- Integrated ProductService with external UserService to fetch user data for access control. - Used RestTemplate to make API calls to the authentication service and retrieve user role and username. - Added role-based access control (USER and ADMIN) for creating, updating, and deleting products in orders. - Ensured that users can only manage their own orders and products, while admins have full access.

task.summary: Building a microservice structure and creating order entities
Building a microservice structure and creating order entities
